title: Can someone tell me how much ping you will have on the PBE server from Aus?
body: Would really love to know. Thanks. How long are the button delays. Is it still playable?

replies.body: It may also depend on whether you are using your home internet connection or McDonalds internet

I used to hover around 200

Haven't used that account in a few years though

200-300

you also need a lv 30 NA account
Probably the same as the NA server (200-250) as i'm fairly certain it's an NA server (i could be mistaken).
